content: **details** * siobhán is pronounced shi-vawn * this pattern is worked in 15 rounds * level advanced * stitches in pattern slip_stitch chain single_crochet double_crochet fpdc bpdc fp-tc2tog puff small picot large picot --------------------------------- **languages** *pattern is available in english russian and persian * * *russian language translation provided by ula tomaszewska and tested by tatyana norri * * *persian/فارسی language translation provided by maryam amiri * * *spanish/espanol language translation and testing provided by virginia padilla and tere gomis * --------------------------------- join our discussion and support group on facebook 1 join our discord channel 2 1 https //www facebook com/groups/878254922303627/ 2 https //discord gg/atndgvj
